data.name: Galaxy X
data.detailed_description:
Embark on an epic journey in this hardcore Multiplayer RPG! As a Galactic Cadet, you and your Combat Squad of friends must brave hostile worlds in search of valuable loot and resources. Craft powerful gear, slay otherworldly creatures, and save the galaxy.

1. Operation instructions
① "←→" controls the movement of the tank
② "↑↓" to adjust the shooting Angle
③ "As" weapon switch
④ "123456" used items
⑤ Space key launch



2. How to get started
When the game is loaded, click on Game Start to start the game.

3. Game objectives
Operate properly and defeat your opponent.

data.short_description: Embark on an epic journey in this hardcore Multiplayer RPG! As a Galactic Cadet, you and your Combat Squad of friends must brave hostile worlds in search of valuable loot and resources. Craft powerful gear, slay otherworldly creatures, and save the galaxy.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core-i3 or faster processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core-i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 750ti
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
